discourse_list.title: TALK - Transcending the Individualism & Collectivist Divide

content.content: Screen Shot 2021-11-10 at 1.18.30 PM1920×1200 83.8 KB  I just released a post on twitter entitled Transcending the  Individualism & Collectivist Divide making the case that there is a large opportunity to create alignment between these Individualist/Collectivist communities with web3 (and thereby move past the differences with views on public goods funding). TLDR of the talk  Individualists/Collectivists do not agree how to organize society. These disagreements were amplified by the nation-state era. We can bridge this divide with web3.  Check it out here.
